head.title: Remove Metadata to {{EXT}} Files in {{ProgLang}} Applications
head.description: {{ProgLang}} metadata processing API to remove metadata information to {{EXT}} files. Work with metadata standards XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3 etc.

header.title: Remove Metadata From {{EXT}} File In {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Remove metadata information from a variety of documents, images, audio & video file formats using {{ProductFullName}} API.

about.title: About {{ProductFullName}} API
about.h1: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/metadata/{{ProductCode}}/) offers an advanced set of metadata manipulation features, allowing developers to easily read, edit, remove, search, compare, replace and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Use metadata management API to delete metadata details from PDF, Microsoft Office Word, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook, OneNote, Visio, Project, AutoCAD, Archive and Multimedia file formats along with many other metadata processing features.

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/metadata/{{ProductCode}}/) makes it easy for {{ProductName}} developers to remove  metadata details to {{EXT}} files from within their applications by implementing a few easy steps.
content_left.step_1: Load {{EXT}} with an instance of Metadata class.
content_left.step_2: Use a predicate to find desired metadata properties.
content_left.step_3: Use Metadata.RemoveProperties method to remove the properties.
content_left.step_4: Save the changes back in {{EXT}} format.

content_right.description: {{ProductFullName}} APIs are supported on all major platforms and operating systems. Before executing the code below, please make sure that you have the following prerequisites installed on your system.
content_right.step_1: Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows, Linux, MacOS
content_right.step_4: Download the latest version of {{ProductFullName}} from [{{RepoName}}]({{RepoUrl}})

steps.title_code: How to remove Metaddata {{EXT}} file using {{ProgLang}} example code

code.remove_mention_comment: Remove all mentions of any people contributed in file creation
code.remove_prop_comment: Remove all properties with the specified name

more_formats.title: Deleting Metadata Properties From Other File Formats
more_formats.content: Multi format documents and images metadata deletion API for {{ProductName}}. Retrieve metadata of some of the popular file formats as stated below.
